name: lara-translate_translate
description: Translate text between languages with support for language detection, context-aware translations and translation memories using Lara Translate.

text.description: An array of text blocks to translate. Each block contains a text string and a boolean indicating whether it should be translated. This allows for selective translation where some text blocks can be preserved in their original form while others are translated.

source.description: The source language code (e.g., 'en-EN' for English). If not specified, the system will attempt to detect it automatically. If you have a hint about the source language, you should specify it in the source_hint field.

target.description: The target language code (e.g., 'it-IT' for Italian). This specifies the language you want the text translated into.

context.description: Additional context string to improve translation quality (e.g., 'This is a legal document' or 'Im talking with a doctor'). This helps the translation system better understand the domain.

instructions.description: A list of instructions to adjust the network’s behavior regarding the output (e.g., 'Use a formal tone').

source_hint.description: Used to guide language detection. Specify this when the source language is uncertain to improve detection accuracy.

adapt_to.description: A list of translation memory IDs for adapting the translation.

name: lara-translate_create_memory
description: Create a translation memory with a custom name in your Lara Translate account. Translation memories store pairs of source and target text segments (translation units) for reuse in future translations.

name.description: The name of the new memory, it should be short and generic, like 'catch_phrases' or 'brand_names'

external_id.description: The ID of the memory to be imported from MyMemory. Use this to initialize the memory with external content. Format: ext_my_[MyMemory ID]

name: lara-translate_delete_memory
description: Deletes a translation memory from your Lara Translate account.

id.description: The unique identifier of the memory to update. Format: mem_xyz123

name: lara-translate_update_memory
description: Updates a translation memory in your Lara Translate account.

id.description: The unique identifier of the memory to update. Format: mem_xyz123

name.description: The new name for the memory

name: lara-translate_add_translation
description: Adds a translation to a translation memory in your Lara Translate account.

id.description: The ID or list of IDs where to save the translation unit. Format: mem_xyz123

source.description: The source language code of the sentence, it MUST be a language supported by the system, use the list_languages tool to get a list of all the supported languages

target.description: The target language code of the translation, it MUST be a language supported by the system, use the list_languages tool to get a list of all the supported languages

sentence_before.description: The sentence before the source sentence to specify the context of the translation unit

sentence_after.description: The sentence after the source sentence to specify the context of the translation unit

name: lara-translate_delete_translation
description: Deletes a translation from a translation memory from your Lara Translate account.

id.description: The ID or list of IDs where to delete the translation unit from. Format: mem_xyz123

source.description: The source language code of the sentence

target.description: The target language code of the translation

sentence_before.description: The sentence before the source sentence to specify the context of the translation unit

sentence_after.description: The sentence after the source sentence to specify the context of the translation unit

name: lara-translate_import_tmx
description: Imports a TMX file into a translation memory in your Lara Translate account.

id.description: The ID of the memory to update. Format: mem_xyz123.

tmx_content.description: The content of the tmx file to upload. Don't provide this if you choose to use tmx_url.

tmx_url.description: A URL to the tmx file to upload. Don't provide this if you choose to use tmx_content.

gzip.description: Indicates if the file is a compressed .gz file

name: lara-translate_check_import_status
description: Checks the status of a TMX file import job in your Lara Translate account.

id.description: The ID of the import job

name: lara-translate_list_memories
description: Lists all translation memories in your Lara Translate account.

name: lara-translate_list_languages
description: Lists all supported languages in your Lara Translate account.
